channel.title: Delete ALL basic runescape objects? And how to add ground?
channel.description: How do I delete all the runescape objects so it's just white (or whatever color the background is) so I can add a flat ground and start building myself. Also how do I ADD flooring (like grass, ground, concrete, etc) where people can walk on when its all white.

item.title: Delete ALL basic runescape objects? And how to add ground?
item.dc:creator: @SnowBoarder7 SnowBoarder7
item.description:
@SnowBoarder7 wrote:

Ive seen people make there own ground before! I dont get why it’d be so hard… A flat object with collision and a texture…

Read full topic
item.source: Delete ALL basic runescape objects? And how to add ground?

item.title: Delete ALL basic runescape objects? And how to add ground?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Well not sure about that, but i guess your best bet is editing the cache.

item.source: Delete ALL basic runescape objects? And how to add ground?

item.title: Delete ALL basic runescape objects? And how to add ground?
item.dc:creator: @SnowBoarder7 SnowBoarder7
item.description:
@SnowBoarder7 wrote:

No, I know how to add objects, im trying to make a blank space so I can add my own ground and start on a new area fresh not using part of runescape.

Read full topic
item.source: Delete ALL basic runescape objects? And how to add ground?

item.title: Delete ALL basic runescape objects? And how to add ground?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

SnowBoarder7:

Frick. That sucks, I thought the ground would’ve been server-sided for sure… and if i ::tele to a place that doesnt have any objects like 900000 900000 (for example) could I add objects there?

Your confused here; objects are server sided, not the cache, the cache isnt modified through the server, i think there is a cache editor somewere on these forums, should be easily able to add those things you wanted…

If you want to add objects, like if you mean a box (that kind of object) then just go to your makeglobalobject method and add it.

Read full topic
item.source: Delete ALL basic runescape objects? And how to add ground?

item.source: Delete ALL basic runescape objects? And how to add ground?

item.title: Delete ALL basic runescape objects? And how to add ground?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“SnowBoarder7, post:1, topic:384591”]How do I delete all the runescape objects so it’s just white (or whatever color the background is) so I can add a flat ground and start building myself.
Also how do I ADD flooring (like grass, ground, concrete, etc) where people can walk on when its all white.[/quote]
Well to delete objects like lets say a box, you need to go to your deletethatobject method, and set the coords of the object, as for the buildings, grass, concrete, and the paths etc, i think you would need to edit your client’s cache.

Read full topic
